name: Colorful Mixed Vegetables
description: This Colorful Mixed Vegetables recipe is a delightful blend of flavors and textures, perfect for those seeking a low-carb, low-sodium, and high-fiber meal option. Incorporated into both healthy and healthified recipes, these vibrant vegetables not only offer nutritional benefits but also add a splash of color to your table.

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the vegetables by washing the eggplant, carrots, cucumber, and baby corn under cold water.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the eggplant into 1-inch cubes, chop the carrots, slice the cucumber, and halve the baby corn.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a large skillet, melt the butter over medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Add the eggplant and carrots to the skillet, and sauté for about 5 minutes, until they start to soften.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Add the cucumber and baby corn to the skillet, and continue to sauté for another 5 minutes, until all vegetables are tender but still crisp.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Season with a pinch of salt and pepper to taste. Serve warm as a colorful side dish.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
